channel.title: vulnhub on defstryker | home
channel.description: Recent content in vulnhub on defstryker | home

item.title: Skytower
item.description: We first get the IP address of the vulnhub box by running an ARP scan. sudo arp-scan -l We find that the IP in this case is 192.168.1.65. Recon From there we run an nmap SYN scan: sudo nmap -sS -sC -sV -O -vvvv 192.168.1.65 -oA nmap/skytower -sS -> SYN Scan -sC -> run default scripts -sV -> run version scan on services found -O -> try to detect OS
